summary: This bill, the Bicycles for Rural African Transport Act, establishes a program within USAID to promote mobility in rural communities in sub-Saharan Africa. The program aims to provide access to affordable bicycles, supporting access to critical services like education, healthcare, and livelihood opportunities. It authorizes appropriations for the program from fiscal year 2026 through 2030 and beyond and requires reports to Congress on both past and current related projects by USAID.
